description:
Reliable wheels that are great for breathing life into old bikes, repairs, or custom builds that won’t break the bank. Constructed with single-walled rims and stainless steep Sapim spokes, these wheels are ready to roll.

  • WTB DX18 rims use 6061 aluminum and are light and strong
  • Single wall rims help keep weight low
  • CNC machined sidewalls have rim wear indicators
  • Compatible with rim brakes and disc brakes that use 6-bolt rotors
  • Assembled in North America by experienced wheel builders with Sapim 14G stainless steel spokes and 14mm brass Polyax nipples
  • Quick-release axles included
  • Inner width: 18mm
  • Rim depth: 18mm
name: Wheel Shop WTB DX18 26" Disc/Rim Wheels
